projects.name: Heart Shoes
projects.description: As my latest pair of shoes I’ve made, I consider these the best, and the culmination of much of what I’ve learned. These are the first pair of sneakers with all the parts that make up a sneaker: a sewn upper with eyelets and a tongue, heel padding, and heat formed toe and heel caps, that keep the shape.

projects.name: Planthetic Pipes
projects.description: Planthetic Pipes was a brand project I started in 2019 to explore wooden pipe making and test different design ideas using my wooden lathe and woodworking shop. I learned a lot about scaled production and designing with the manufacturing process in mind.
